attributes.action: introduce legislation to make it illegal to have any lights on in, nor any illuminating the outside of, any national or local government offices after 6.00pm Monday to Thursday and from 6.00pm Friday to 8.00am Mondays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Watching news reports tonight the House of Commons and the Home Office building was lit up like it was something we could continue to afford.  The big question is 'Why?'  Why should the House of Commons be lit up at night?  Why should there be lights on in the Home Office after office hours?  In this day where all us mere taxpayers are being told it is going to cost us a fortune to pay for carbon footprint reduction it is my feeling that these lights need to be switched off.
